channel.title: Changing shops content
channel.description:
Ok, I want my general store to sell rares and thesselia to sell robes, How do I change the content of the shops...I searched their NPC Id on Client.Java and It you can't change it (because I'm a noob, Help very much appreciated)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 02, 2006, 05:09:44 AM[/size][hr]Ok, found it...
For anyone else looking for the same thing go to Shops.dat

item.title: Changing shops content
item.dc:creator: @pista pista
item.description:
@pista wrote:

go to shops…
now u will see shop id,shop name,sell,buy,item,amount,item,amount…
item there is id of item u cant chcange it and amount its how many of item hcange it too…
